# Quick start {-}

## 1 Install openlayers {-}

You can install <span class="package">openlayers <span class="into-the-blue">4 R</span></span> from github with:

```{r}
devtools::install_github("crazycapivara/openlayers")
```

## 2 Attach the namespace {-}

```{r, eval = TRUE}
library(openlayers)
```

## 3 Create a new map object {-}

```{r}
map <- ol()
```

## 4 Add tiles {-}

```{r}
map <- ol() %>%
  add_osm_tiles()
```

## 5 Add some features {-}

```{r, message = FALSE}
map <- ol() %>%
  add_stamen_tiles() %>%
  add_features(geojsonio::us_cities[1:5, ],
               style = icon_style())
```

## 6 Render the map {-}

```{r}
map
```
